welcome: Welcome to Intelligent Book Management System
welcome2: Intelligent Book Management System exists to serve all people, we now support machine automatic book pickup and return service, you can also check the date of borrowing books and check the time of returning books online. Welcome to use!
act2: Depending on your preferences and choices, we recommend these books.
gu2: You can search for what you want by using the Book search button on the navigation bar.
